name: Pinball! Exam Game
description:
Z - left paddle.

/ - right paddle,

Space - launch and turbo boost

Numbers 0-9, change level

Left Mouse - Debug ball placement

Features:

Basic pinball controlling

Most extra functionality done

Two bonus levels

Font used - https://www.1001freefonts.com/arcade-classic.font

Wallpaper Used - https://wallpapersafari.com/w/gyIT3n

Bumper Sound - https://freesound.org/people/vacuumfan7072/sounds/396030/

Paddle Sound - https://freesound.org/people/bassmosphere/sounds/384698/

Music, Space Jazz by Kevin Macleod, downloaded from - https://filmmusic.io/
